name: To-do List Template
description: Simple. Minimal. Effective. Track your daily tasks and progress with ease.This Notion To-Do List Template is a simple yet powerful way to manage your daily tasks. Perfect for anyone who loves a clean and minimal setup, it helps you stay on top of your goals without the overwhelm.✅ Features: A simple to-do list table to organize tasks by priority.
